abstract: Most leases stipulate that at the end of the term, the tenant must pay for the complete demolition of any improvements.
snippet: Most leases stipulate that at the end of the term, the tenant must pay for the complete demolition of any improvements.
lead_paragraph: If you open a business in China, you will require work space. But there’s a catch: To rent or lease a space, you need a business license. And obtaining a license can take anywhere from five months to two years, depending on whether your business is in a regulated or unregulated industry.
